name: Modeerf
description:
The scenario of this game is inspired by Plato's Cave.

Plato's Cave, is an allegory presented by the Greek philosopher Plato. 

More information: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allegory_of_the_cave

Buttons:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Interact: F

Don't press ESC - its buggy!

Wherever your character Freeze press Space!

Meet these characters in this game:

The Slave

The Desperate

The Extremist

The Survivor

And Ariana!

I hope you enjoy game!

#WomanLifeFreedom
